title: New Citibank Hungary Mobile Banking Application Provides an Enhanced Digital Experience and New Features
summary: Budapest, Hungary - Customers will now be able to open a time deposit, find the nearest Citibank branch or ATM through a GPS navigation system and access other banking services with the launch of the new Citibank Mobile Banking application.
tag-1: New Citibank Hungary Mobile Banking Application Provides an Enhanced Digital Experience and New Features
tag-2: Budapest, Hungary – Customers will now be able to open a time deposit, find the nearest Citibank branch or ATM through a GPS navigation system and access other banking services with the launch of the new Citibank Mobile Banking application.

tag-4: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said, "Citibank Mobile Banking allows customers to enjoy a superior, secure and smart banking experience anytime and anywhere in the world, including transactions on their Citibank accounts. With this new application, we have made another significant step in reaching our goal to become the world's and Hungary's leading digital bank."
tag-5: Jon Wiggins, Consumer Business Manager for Hungary, remarked: "A number of our tech-savvy customers started to use our mobile banking service when we introduced it last summer. We are responding to their lifestyle needs with our new mobile phone application that gives an enhanced digital experience to our iPhone or Android smartphone user customers. They can, of course, decide to use this new application or the Citibank Online banking service specially optimized for mobile phones, but most importantly both applications are bringing secure banking right to the palm of our customers' hands."

tag-7: The security level of Citibank Mobile Banking compares to the standards of Citibank Online. The application is protected with strong encryption (128-bit Secure Sockets Layer) for access and transactions, and the online session will be automatically terminated after being idle for five minutes, preventing unauthorized use of the session.
tag-8: More information about Citi Mobile and other Citibank services are available at the www.citibank.hu/mobilbank website. Follow us on Citibank Hungary's Facebook site at www.facebook.com/CitibankMagyarorszag.
